description: This table contains information for both OASIS Data Sets and Hospice Item Sets.

columns.name: DATASET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the data set record.

columns.name: DATA_SET_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the current submission status of the OASIS dataset or Hospice item set.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


New


Visit Complete


Marked for Submission


Submitted


Accepted


Rejected


Voided


In Progress


Ready for 3rd Party


Sent to 3rd Party

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: This item links to the patient record (EPT) of the patient associated with the Data Set.

columns.name: DATASET_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores what type of dataset the record is. Currently datasets can be OASIS or HIS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


OASIS Dataset


HIS Dataset

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: This item contains the CSN for the encounter associated with the OASIS data set.
